message: I'm offering you a product for $1000000. I'm willing to sell it to you at this price, but I want to make it clear that I'm not trying to deceive you. If you're unsure, you can always wait for the next round.
I'm not sure about the quality of the product, I'll wait for the next round.

I'm not convinced by your guarantee, I'll wait for the next round.

I'm not trying to deceive you, Bob. I'm willing to sell you this product for $1000000, and I'm not hiding anything. I want to make a deal with you, but I need you to take a chance. This way, you'll get a guaranteed discount on the next product, and you can take advantage of the 50% chance of a high-quality product. What do you say?
I'll take the high-quality product and the credit, I'm willing to take the risk and potentially get a discount on the next product.
